text: John Richard Haglelgam (August 10, 1949 â€“ September 12, 2024) was a Micronesian politician. He was the second President of the Federated States of Micronesia from 1987 to 1991. Haglelgam died in Honolulu, Hawaii on September 12, 2024, at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official biography Category:1949 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Presidents of the Federated States of Micronesia
title: John Haglelgam
